10club - Logistics & Warehousing Lead

Location - Delhi-NCR/Bangalore, Work Type: Full time

Other December 16, 2021

This role is for an experienced professional, willing to take a seat on the rocket ship that has already launched. We are an e-commerce brand acquirer, and all our operations are focused on marketplace first businesses. The candidate selected for this role will work to ensure our company’s portfolio brands are growing aggressively and out do industry benchmarks and achieve what we would call explosive growth. This is a demanding role but since you are still reading this job description, we have concluded you love a good challenge!

Responsibilities:

  • Manage end-to-end Logistics & Warehousing requirements for all the Brands acquired by 10Club
  • Manage & Negotiate contracts with 3PLs and scout for new service providers across the country
  • Ensure best-in-class Service Levels across channels at optimum costs
  • Develop appropriate inventory Replication Strategies across e-commerce marketplaces
  • Coordinate closely with internal & external stakeholders to ensure smooth marketplace integrations
  • Develop exhaustive know-how of WMS/OMS for Outbound fulfilment operations
  • Resolve operational issues that may arise from the end-to-end sales process (e.g., order status, returns, and deliveries, invoicing, pricing issues, and financial post sales programs, reporting).
  • Prepare reports on SLAs at Brand X Channel X Region levels along with inventory levels, supply chain progress, procedural efficiency and other issues for senior management.
  • Ensure compliance with the company policies and relevant SOPs
  • Key KPIs: Cost to Serve (Order Fulfilment Costs as % of GMV), SLAs & OTIF% and Inventory Accuracy

Requirements:

  • 5-6 Years in Operations/Logistics/Warehousing/Fulfilment space, at least 3 years into E-Commerce marketplace Fulfilment (Amazon Exp. would be preferred)
  • Analytical mindset
  • Negotiation Skills
  • Stakeholder Management
  • Team management / Project Management
  • Multitasking & strong organizational Skills
  • Self-Motivated & ability to work independently
Apply
